short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Returns mock data for specific routes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Google Chrome extension designed to intercept specific fetch requests and respond with mocked data. This extension allows developers to simulate API responses for testing and development purposes without needing to interact with a live backend. The extension provides a user interface to set, get, remove, and clear mocked endpoints and their corresponding responses, which are stored locally using Chrome's storage API. You can also import and export in JSON.
